title: Pricing Option
description: A pricing model option offered by a publisher for a product

pricing_option_id.description: Unique identifier for this pricing option within the product (e.g., 'cpm_usd_guaranteed', 'cpcv_usd_auction')

rate.description: The rate for this pricing model (interpretation depends on pricing_model type)

is_fixed.description: Whether this is a fixed rate (true) or auction-based (false)

price_guidance.description: Pricing guidance for auction-based pricing (required if is_fixed is false)

floor.description: Minimum bid price - publisher will reject bids under this value

parameters.description: Additional parameters specific to this pricing model

demographic.description: Target demographic for CPP pricing in Nielsen format: P/M/W/A/C + age range. Examples: P18-49 (Persons 18-49), M25-54 (Men 25-54), W35+ (Women 35+), A18-34 (Adults 18-34), C2-11 (Children 2-11)

min_points.description: Minimum GRPs/TRPs required for CPP pricing

oneOf.description: Percentage completion threshold for CPV pricing (0.0 to 1.0, e.g., 0.5 = 50% completion)
Time-based view threshold for CPV pricing

duration_seconds.description: Seconds of viewing required (e.g., 30 for YouTube-style '30 seconds = view')

action_type.description: Type of action for CPA pricing (e.g., 'purchase', 'sign_up', 'download')

attribution_window_days.description: Attribution window in days for CPA/CPL pricing

duration_hours.description: Duration in hours for time-based flat rate pricing (DOOH)

sov_percentage.description: Guaranteed share of voice as percentage (DOOH, 0-100)

loop_duration_seconds.description: Duration of ad loop rotation in seconds (DOOH)

min_plays_per_hour.description: Minimum number of times ad plays per hour (DOOH frequency guarantee)

venue_package.description: Named venue package identifier for DOOH (e.g., 'times_square_network', 'airport_terminals')

estimated_impressions.description: Estimated impressions for this pricing option (informational, commonly used with SOV or time-based DOOH)

min_spend_per_package.description: Minimum spend requirement per package using this pricing option, in the specified currency
